annotations: -Proven experience in front-desk administration in hotels (14 years) and medical office (1 year, 9 mos.) dedicated to delivering first-rate service and fostering positive relationship with guests/clients to achieve efficient and expedient assistance.
-An unwavering commitment to customer service with the ability to build productive relationships, resolve complex issues and win customer loyalty.
Microsoft Word, Excel, LMS, World - Detailed and organized
-Scheduled patient testing and treatment with multiple hospital facilities, followed-up for timely reports
-Worked as a team with nurses’ station, chemotherapy, lab and medical records
-Responsible for processing insurance claims, medical coding, patient billing accounts receivables, collection issues and processing of patient prescriptions requests
-Responded to patient complaints, resolve issues and complied to requests to ensure customer satisfaction
-Supervised staff front office and reservation functions for 600-room resort hotel
-Trained and supervised employees in customer service, cashiering, reconciling receipts, marketing, phone procedures and computer data-entry
-Improved customer service and streamlined reservations procedures
-Oversee cash flow revenue, reconciliation of daily receipts and posting of data to spreadsheets, tracing discrepancies and ensuring accuracy in every detail
-Coordinated interdepartmental practices to ensure quality customer service
Las Vegas Blvd., Las Vegas, Nevada
-Handled incoming phone calls, recorded guest requests and fulfilled guest needs
-Assisted guests with check-in including confirmation of booking, room readiness and offered marketing promotions
-Registered new guests, recorded information and inputted data into internal system, updated room capacities and vacancies
-Responded to guest complaints or support requests and conducted analysis on request rates to determine customer satisfaction
-Processed guest payments and prepared records on weekly cash flow revenue
-Facilitated check-out for guest-related information on checkouts to cleaning department
Bachelor of Science in Agriculture (Major in Crop Science and Economics)
Attended Customer Service Training in Excalibur Hotel and Casino in 2003 which included how to:
-Greet, transfer and hold calls. Build rapport, listen, clarify and manage conversational flow.
-Manage upset customers, conflicts and challenging situations
